video.title: When you choose Crown Homes, we start with this promise: "No surprises".
video.text: We’ll always tell you up front what the cost will be and how long it will take. If at any point we surprise you with a cost, a change or a date you didn’t sign off on first, we’ll make it right.

homeCTA.title: Ready to Build Your Dream Home?

about.title: About Us
about.text: Crown Homes, LLC is a licensed & insured residential home builder operating in the central Mississippi area, focusing on Rankin County real estate. We specialize in New Residential Homes and Custom Homes, and also provide current listings of new houses for sale in Brandon and Pearl Mississippi.
